title: ConfigService
content:
{
    "title": "ConfigService",
    "description": "",
    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: ConfigService
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A game service that gives access to in-experience configuration with updates
  in real time.
description: |
  ConfigService exposes methods for getting Class.ConfigSnapshot objects.
  Configs can only be accessed by game servers, so you can't use
  Class.ConfigService within client scripts.

  See Experience configs for an in-depth guide
  on managing keys, deploying real-time updates, error handling, limits, and
  more.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - Service
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''
properties: []
methods:
  - name: ConfigService:ClearTestingValue
    summary: |
      Clears current testing value for the given key.
    description: |
      Removes a testing override created by the
      Class.ConfigService:SetTestingValue()|SetTestingValue() function. The
      actual configured value will be returned after calling this function.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: key
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Key of the configuration to clear testing value for.
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: ConfigService:GetConfigAsync
    summary: |
      Retrieves a snapshot of the latest configuration.
    description: |
      This function retrieves the latest available configuration as a
      Class.ConfigSnapshot instance without player targeting. Snapshots can be
      refreshed to the latest values by calling
      Class.ConfigSnapshot:Refresh().

      Experiments are not applied since there is no player context.

      If configuration fails to load and there is no previously available
      configuration, this function throws an error.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ConfigSnapshot
        summary: |
          A Class.ConfigSnapshot instance with the latest configuration.
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: ConfigService:GetConfigForPlayerAsync
    summary: |
      Retrieves a snapshot of the latest configuration for a specific player.
    description: |
      Retrieves the latest available configuration as a Class.ConfigSnapshot
      instance targeting to the given player. Snapshots can be refreshed to the
      latest values by calling Class.ConfigSnapshot:Refresh().

      This function applies all experiments running for the player.

      If configuration fails to load and there is no previously available
      configuration, this function throws an error.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: player
        type: Player
        default:
        summary: |
          The player to get the configuration for.
    returns:
      - type: ConfigSnapshot
        summary: |
          A Class.ConfigSnapshot instance with the latest configuration
          targeted to the player.
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: ConfigService:SetTestingValue
    summary: |
      Sets a testing override for the given key.
    description: |
      Sets a testing override for the specified configuration key in the current
      server instance. When a testing value is set, calls to
      Class.ConfigSnapshot:GetValue() for that key will return the testing
      value instead of the actual configured value.

      Testing values can be cleared by calling the
      Class.ConfigService:ClearTestingValue()|ClearTestingValue() function.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: key
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Key of the configuration to override with a testing value.
      - name: value
        type: Variant
        default:
        summary: |
          Value to set as the testing override.
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
events: []
callbacks: []",
    "source": "ConfigService.yaml"
}
